name: European Mancozeb Task Force
legal: Consortium for the purpose of scientific development/EU authorisation process
headAddress: The Centre - 1st Floor, Chadwick Place, UPL Europe
membership: UPL Europe Ltd is an associate member of the European Crop Protection Association (ECPA) & European Crop Care Association (ECCA)
goal: The EU Mancozeb Task Force is a joint activity of UPL Europe Ltd and Indofil Industries Ltd as notifiers of the active substance Mancozeb. Our mission is to provide comprehensive and science-based information on Mancozeb and its application. The EU Mancozeb Taskforce is committed to undertake the development of relevant studies and trials to meet the requirements set out in relevant legislations on pesticides. Mancozeb manufacturers work towards the continuous improvement of the application methods.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health
euInitiatives:
European Commission Annual Work Programme and Roadmaps
European Commission Impact Assessment webpage
EUR-Lex database
Endocrine Disruptor Public Consultation
